faq.title: Frequently asked questions about cryptocurrency taxation
faq.subtitle: We answer the most common questions about digital asset filing in Spain.

q1.question: Do I have to declare my cryptocurrencies even if I haven't sold them?
q1.answer: Yes, if you have cryptocurrencies abroad worth more than ‚Ç¨50,000, you must declare them in form 720. Additionally, any sale, exchange, or use of cryptocurrencies generates a capital alteration that must be declared in the income tax return, regardless of whether you withdraw the money or not.

q2.question: How does AEAT calculate gains and losses in cryptocurrencies?
q2.answer: AEAT applies the FIFO (First In, First Out) criterion: the first cryptocurrencies you bought are considered the first ones sold. Each sale or exchange generates a capital gain or loss that must be calculated with the acquisition price and the transfer price. We apply this criterion exactly in all our reports.

q3.question: Do DeFi operations (staking, liquidity pools, farming) have tax implications?
q3.answer: Yes. Staking and farming rewards are considered capital income. Swaps between tokens, even in DeFi, are exchanges that generate capital gains or losses. Liquidity provision may involve taxable events depending on how it's structured. At Cleriontax, we analyze each DeFi protocol to tax-classify each operation.

q4.question: Why do automatic software programs give incorrect results?
q4.answer: Automatic tools don't understand the Spanish tax context and don't correctly reconcile movements between wallets, duplicates, or internal transfers. Additionally, they don't correctly classify complex DeFi operations (such as wrapping, bridging, or multichain staking). At Cleriontax, we manually review each operation and correct these errors to guarantee a 100% accurate report.

q5.question: What information do I need to order my tax report?
q5.answer: We need CSV files from all your exchanges (Binance, Kraken, Coinbase, etc.), the addresses of your on-chain wallets (MetaMask, Ledger, etc.), and any record of operations on DeFi platforms. It's also useful if you indicate the approximate dates of purchase of your first assets if you don't have complete records.

q6.question: How long does the process take and what is the price?
q6.answer: The time depends on transaction volume: from 3-5 days for simple cases to 2-3 weeks for very complex portfolios with thousands of DeFi transactions. The price adjusts according to complexity, number of platforms, and data volume. Request your quote without obligation and we'll give you an accurate estimate within 24-48h.

sections.body: At Cleriontax we specialize in two critical areas for investors with complex portfolios: financial data analysis and tax engineering. We work with investors operating across multiple platforms, exchanges, on-chain wallets and DeFi protocols, who need to consolidate thousands of transactions into verifiable tax reports compatible with the AEAT. Our approach combines advanced data processing technology with deep knowledge of Spanish tax regulations, applying FIFO, transaction classification and full traceability in every report we produce. We are not a generalist tax agency nor an automatic software: we are specialists at solving tax complexity through applied data engineering.

We offer four specialized services designed to cover the different needs investors with high-complexity portfolios face. Each service adapts to the sophistication of your portfolio and the level of automation you require.

subsections.title: Analysis of Complex Investment Portfolios
subsections.body: For investors with multiple data sources, hundreds of thousands of transactions and assets scattered across exchanges, brokers and blockchains. We integrate data from 50 or more platforms, apply advanced cleaning, reconciliation of duplicated transactions, and generate consolidated reports of performance, balances and operations. This service is essential if you operate with DeFi, multichain staking, airdrops or any decentralized investment structure. It includes data modeling, cross-validation, custom exports and full documentation for audits or tax requirements.

subsections.title: Tax Settlements and AEAT Forms
subsections.body: Complete preparation of your tax obligations: calculation of capital gains and losses using FIFO, investment income, tax scenario simulations and generation of forms 100, 721 and 714. We work with you to optimize your declaration within the legal framework, applying DGT criteria and current regulations. This service includes a full dossier with supporting documentation, justification of each calculation and review by certified tax advisors. Ideal if you have complex operations in cryptocurrencies, international stocks or multilayer tax structures.

subsections.title: Real-Time Portfolio Tracking
subsections.body: We connect your wallets and exchange accounts to tracking tools like CoinTracking to provide continuous visibility of your portfolio. You receive real-time dashboards, configurable alerts, consolidated balances and historical comparisons. This service is aimed at less complex portfolios that don't require advanced data engineering but do need constant monitoring and automated reporting. If your portfolio exceeds a certain complexity level, we will recommend our portfolio analysis service instead.

subsections.title: Specialized Tax Advisory
subsections.body: Personalized 1:1 sessions with our tax team to resolve specific questions about filing forms, classification criteria, regulatory compliance and report structure. We do not offer investment advice or recommendations on which assets to buy or sell. Our focus is technical and tax-oriented: we help you interpret regulations, prepare documentation for AEAT requirements and understand how to correctly apply tax criteria to your specific case. Includes document review, technical Q&A and post-session follow-up.

steps.body: Send us information about your platforms, approximate transaction volume and types of assets. We analyze your case within 24‚Äì48 hours and send you an initial diagnosis with no obligation. If your case requires advanced data analysis or complex tax preparation, we recommend the most suitable service.

items.q: What differentiates your service from automatic software like Koinly or CoinTracking?
items.a: Automatic software applies generic algorithms that do not account for the specificities of Spanish tax regulations, do not properly reconcile internal wallet movements and generate errors in the classification of complex DeFi operations. We apply human tax criteria, manual review of critical operations and personalized data modeling for each case. Our approach combines technology with tax expertise, ensuring traceability, accuracy and real regulatory compliance.

items.q: Do you only work with cryptocurrencies or also with stocks and other assets?
items.a: We work with any type of financial asset: cryptocurrencies, stocks, ETFs, futures, options, bonds, investment funds and alternative assets. Our specialization lies in the complexity of data analysis and tax engineering, not in a specific asset class. If you have a mixed portfolio with multiple data sources, we can consolidate it fully.

items.q: How long does the full process take from first contact to delivery of the tax report?
items.a: It depends on complexity. Simple cases with few platforms and moderate volume can be completed in 5‚Äì7 business days. Complex portfolios with more than 50 data sources, hundreds of thousands of transactions and DeFi operations may require 2 to 4 weeks. In the initial evaluation we will give you a precise timeline based on your specific case.

items.q: Do you offer advice on which cryptocurrencies to buy or how to optimize my investment strategy?
items.a: No. We do not offer investment advice or recommendations on which assets to buy, sell or hold. Our service is strictly technical-tax: financial data analysis, calculation of tax obligations, preparation of AEAT forms and compliance guidance. For investment decisions, we recommend consulting an independent financial advisor.

items.q: What guarantees do you offer on the accuracy of tax calculations?
items.a: All our tax reports are reviewed by certified tax advisors specialized in crypto assets. We apply certified FIFO methodology, full traceability of every calculation and auditable supporting documentation. If we detect errors after delivery, we correct them at no additional cost. Each report includes technical justification and applicable regulatory references.

items.q: How do you guarantee the confidentiality and security of my financial data?
items.a: We process all data in our own secure environments without uploading it to third-party cloud services. We apply end-to-end encryption, role-restricted access and strict data retention policies. We sign confidentiality agreements with every client and comply with GDPR. Your data is deleted from our systems once the legally required retention period ends.
